types.name: UserSelfConnection
types.description: Subjective data on another User (user/channel) for the current user.

fields.name: availableBadges
fields.description: The badges which are available for the authenticated user to select for use on another user's streams and videos.

fields.name: banStatus
fields.description: Ban status of the authenticated user with respect to this user's channel.

fields.name: bitsBadge
fields.description:
bitsBadge contains information about bits badge progression in a channel.
This field can only be requested if an OAuth token is supplied with the request.

fields.name: bitsLeaderboardEntry
fields.description:
The bits leaderboard entry shows the current user's entry in the
channel's leaderboard. It does not show context entries around it.

fields.name: bitsLeaderboardItem
fields.description:
The bits leaderboard item shows the current user's entry in the
channel's leaderboard. It does not show context entries around it.

fields.name: bitsLeaderboardPosition
fields.description:
The bits leaderboard position shows the curreent users rank
and the surrounding users in the current channel.

fields.name: canGift
fields.description:
CanGift relationship between the authenticated user, another user, and a product.
True is the authenticated user can gift the product to the other user.

fields.name: canGiftInChannel
fields.description:
CanGiftInChannel relationship between the authenticated user and a product.
True is the authenticated user is allowed to send gifts in this channel.

fields.name: canPrimeSubscribe
fields.description: Checks if the authenticated user can subscribe to this channel via Prime.

fields.name: chatRestrictedReasons
fields.description:
If the authenticated user cannot chat in this channel, a list of reasons.
Null if the user can chat.

fields.name: displayBadges
fields.description:
Lists the chat badges that should be displayed by the user's display name in
features on a particular user's channel (i.e. chat, feeds).
Includes the following badges:
- global authority (staff/admin/global mod)
- channel authority (broadcaster/mod)
- subscriber
- channel selected (bits) or global selected (prime, turbo, ...).

fields.name: follower
fields.description:
A follower relationship between the authenticated user and another user.
Null if the relationship does not exist.

fields.name: friendship
fields.description:
The friendship-type relationship (friendship, incoming friend request, outgoing friend request) between the
authenticated user and another user. Null if no friendship-type relationship exists.

fields.name: isChannelMember
fields.description: True if the authenticated user has joined this channel.

fields.name: isEditor
fields.description: Whether or not the authenticated user is editor of a another user's channel.

fields.name: isModerator
fields.description: Whether or not the authenticated user is moderator of a another user's channel.

fields.name: lastRecentChatMessageAt
fields.description:
The timestamp of the last time the authenticated user sent a chat message in another user's channel within the last 30 minutes.
Null if the authenticated user has not chatted in the channel in the last 30 minutes.

fields.name: primeSubCreditBenefit
fields.description: Information about the authenticated user's Prime subscription credit benefit.

fields.name: purchaseTokens
fields.description:
purchaseTokens are the purchase tokens and their current state.
They can be used with ConsumeChatToken to share a recent purchase in another user's channel.

fields.name: resubNotification
fields.description:
The most recent resub token to use for sending a special message.
If no notification is pending this will be null.

fields.name: ritualTokens
fields.description: Lists ritual tokens that can be requested or displayed to the user in another user's channel.

fields.name: selectedBadge
fields.description: The badge the authenticated user selected for use on another user's streams and videos.

fields.name: subscriptionBenefit
fields.description:
The subscription benefit relationship between the authenticated user and another user.
Null if the authenticated user is not subscribed to the other user.

fields.name: subscriptionTenure
fields.description: Subscription tenure data for the user to this channel.

fields.name: whisperPermissions
fields.description: Whether the authenticated user can send or receive Whispers to/from another user.

fields.name: bannedUser
fields.description: The user being banned of this chat.

fields.name: createdAt
fields.description: The time the ban was imposed.

fields.name: expiresAt
fields.description: The time at which the ban will automatically expire.

fields.name: isPermanent
fields.description: Conveys if the ban is permanent.

fields.name: moderator
fields.description: The moderator that carried out the action.

fields.name: roomOwner
fields.description: The entity representing the users channel or chat room.

types.name: UserSelfBitsBadge
types.description:
UserSelfBitsBadge contains the current user's badge tier in a channel and progress toward the next tier.
NOTE: should probably have been named CurrentUserBitsBadge.

fields.name: current
fields.description:
current is the highest bits chat badge the authenticated user has achieved in this channel.
If a badge tier is disabled after being earned it will still appear here until the next tier is earned.
If the user hasn't earned any bits badges yet this will be null.

fields.name: next
fields.description:
next is the next chat badge the authenticated user can earn in this channel.
If this is null then there are no higher tiers to earn.

fields.name: nextBits
fields.description:
nextBits is the bits value of the next chat badge the authenticated user can earn in this channel.
If this is null then there are no higher tiers to earn.

fields.name: progress
fields.description:
progress is the fraction of the way the user is toward the next badge tier [0.0-1.0).
If `next` is null this will be zero.

fields.name: tierNotification
fields.description:
tierNotification represents a notification sent to a user when they have achieved
a new bits badge in a channel. Used to send a special message.
If no notification is pending this will be null.

fields.name: totalBits
fields.description: totalBits is the number of bits the authenticated user has used in this channel.

types.name: BitsBadgeTierNotification
types.description: A notification about achieving a new bits badge tier. Used to send a special message.

fields.name: id
fields.description: UUID for notification.

fields.name: threshold
fields.description: Represents the badge tier threshold reached by the user on a channel (e.g. 100, 1000, etc).

types.name: ChatRestrictedReason
types.description: Reasons that a user might not be allowed to chat in a specific channel.

enumValues.name: SUBSCRIBERS_ONLY
enumValues.description:
The user is prevented from chatting by subscribers-only mode. They should
subscribe to the channel to chat.

enumValues.name: FOLLOWERS_ONLY
enumValues.description:
The user is prevented from chatting by followers-only mode. They should
either follow the channel, or wait longer to satisfy the required time.
See user.self.follower.followedAt for when the user followed, and
user.self.chatSettings.followersOnlyDurationMinutes for the minimum
required follow time.

enumValues.name: VERIFIED_ONLY
enumValues.description:
The user is prevented from chatting by verified-only mode. They should
verify their account to chat.

enumValues.name: SLOW_MODE
enumValues.description:
The user can't chat because they've chatted too recently. See
user.self.lastRecentChatMessageAt to calculate how much time is remaining
before they can chat again.

types.name: FriendRelationship
types.description:
The friend-type relationship between the authenticated user and another user.

If this field is a FriendEdge, the authenticated user and the other user are Friends.

If it is an IncomingFriendRequestEdge, the other user has an open friend request with authenticated user.

If it is an OutgoingFriendRequestEdge, the authenticated user has an open friend request with the other user.

types.name: PrimeSubCreditBenefit
types.description: Information about the authenticated user's Prime subscription credit benefit.

fields.name: renewalDate
fields.description: Checks when the authenticated user's Prime subscription credit will renew.

fields.name: willRenew
fields.description: Checks if the authenticated user has the Prime benefit for 30-day subscription credit renewals.

types.name: PurchaseToken
types.description:
PurchaseToken is a token that appears in the chat, specific to 
a tuid/channel (i.e. if a customer buys a product, we give them the option of 
sharing it in the channel they bought it from).

fields.name: asin
fields.description:
asin is the purchased Amazon ASIN (a unique identifier for products at 
Amazon) to be shared.

fields.name: badges
fields.description:
badges is the set of badges to be shared.  There may be duplicate badges
associated with the same token.

fields.name: bits
fields.description: bits is the set of bits to be shared.

fields.name: crateCount
fields.description: crateCount is the number of crates associated with the purchase.

fields.name: emoteSets
fields.description:
emoteSets is the set of emote sets to be shared.  There may be duplicate
emote sets associated with the same token.

fields.name: id
fields.description: id is the unique message identifier.

fields.name: imageURL
fields.description:
imageURL is the URL for the image to be used for the purchase token.
An optional width can be specified to return an image of the given width. If
no size is specified the images native size will be used.

fields.name: inGameContents
fields.description: In game content is the in game content to be shared.

fields.name: status
fields.description: status is the status of the purchase token.

fields.name: timeReceived
fields.description: timeReceived is the time the chat token token was created.

fields.name: title
fields.description: title is the title to be used for the purchase token.

fields.name: token
fields.description: token is the consumable purchase token.

types.name: BadgePurchaseToken
types.description:
BadgePurchaseToken provides information related to a consumable purchase
token about recently acquired badges.

fields.name: badge
fields.description: badge is the badge associated with the purchase token.

fields.name: id
fields.description: id is the unique badge identifier for the purchase token.

types.name: BitsPurchaseToken
types.description:
BitsPurchaseToken provides information related to a consumable purchase 
token about recently acquired bits.

fields.name: id
fields.description: id is the unique bits identifier for the purchase token.

fields.name: quantity
fields.description: quantity is the quantity of bits acquired.

types.name: EmoteSetPurchaseToken
types.description:
EmoteSetPurchaseToken provides information related to a consumable purchase 
token about recently acquired emote sets.

fields.name: emoteSet
fields.description: emoteSet is the emote set associated with the purchase token.

fields.name: id
fields.description: id is the unique emote set identifier for the purchase token.

types.name: InGameContentPurchaseToken
types.description:
InGameContentPurchaseToken provides information related to a consumable purchase 
token about recently acquired in game content.

fields.name: asin
fields.description:
asin is the purchased Amazon ASIN (a unique identifier for products at 
Amazon) to be shared.

fields.name: description
fields.description: description is the description of the in game content.

fields.name: id
fields.description: id is the unique in game content identifier for the purchase token.

fields.name: imageURL
fields.description:
imageURL is the URL for the image to be used for the in game content.
An optional width can be specified to return an image of the given width. If
no size is specified the images native size will be used.

fields.name: title
fields.description: title is the title to use for the in game content.

types.name: ResubNotification
types.description: A recent resub token to use for sending a special message.

fields.name: id
fields.description: A unique ID for the resub notification.

fields.name: months
fields.description: The number of months of consecutive subbing.

fields.name: token
fields.description: The token to use when submitting a sub/resub message.

types.name: RitualToken
types.description:
A ritual is an opportunity for a viewer to better connect with a streamer's
community by announcing when they reach milestones in the channel.
A ritual token is issued when a user is eligible for the ritual, and can be
redeemed to send the announcement in a channel.

fields.name: channel
fields.description: The channel that the user can redeem the ritual token in.

fields.name: expiresAt
fields.description:
The time after which the ritual is considered expired and can no longer be
redeemed. Clients should dismiss the ritual UI if it's still shown after
this time. Null if the ritual never expires.

fields.name: id
fields.description: A unique ID for the ritual token.

fields.name: status
fields.description: The status of the ritual token.

fields.name: type
fields.description: The type of the ritual to be redeemed.

fields.name: user
fields.description: The user that owns the ritual token.

enumValues.name: ELIGIBLE
enumValues.description: ELIGIBLE means a user does not have this token, but can request one.

enumValues.name: AVAILABLE
enumValues.description: AVAILABLE means a user has been granted this token and it can be redeemed.

enumValues.name: DISMISSED
enumValues.description: DISMISSED means a user has opted out of redeeming this token.

enumValues.name: REDEEMED
enumValues.description: REDEEMED means a user has successfully consumed this token.

enumValues.name: NEW_CHATTER
enumValues.description: NEW_CHATTER is granted 5 minutes after a user joins a channel for the first time.

types.name: WhisperPermissions
types.description: The ability for a Twitch user to send or receive Whispers to/from another Twitch user.

fields.name: receive
fields.description: Capability of the user to receive Whispers from the other Twitch user.

fields.name: send
fields.description: Capability of the user to send Whispers to the other Twitch user.

types.name: WhisperPermissionType
types.description: An enumeration of the permissions for one user to Whisper another.

enumValues.name: PERMITTED
enumValues.description: The sender is allowed to Whisper the recipient.

enumValues.name: NOT_PERMITTED
enumValues.description: The sender is not allowed to Whisper the recipient.

enumValues.name: NOT_RESTRICTED
enumValues.description: Any sender is able to Whisper the recipient.

enumValues.name: TEMPORARY
enumValues.description: The sender is temporarily allowed to Whisper the recipient.

types.name: UserSettings
types.description: Groups site-wide user settings together.

fields.name: channelFeedEnabled
fields.description:
The user's channel feed on/off switch.
The channel feed is displayed if set to true and is
hidden if set to false.

fields.name: cheer
fields.description: The cheer settings for a user, configured in their partner dashboard.

fields.name: hasTwoFactorEnabled
fields.description: Whether or not the user has a second authentication method configured.

fields.name: isAmazonRetailRevShareEnabled
fields.description: Whether or not the broadcaster is eligible for payout through Amazon retail revenue share.

fields.name: isCommerceRevShareEnabled
fields.description: Whether or not the broadcaster is eligible for payout through twitch game commerce revenue share.

fields.name: isDirectoryHidden
fields.description: Whether or not the user has elected to be hidden from search results.

fields.name: isRitualsEnabled
fields.description: Whether the user's channel has rituals enabled.

fields.name: isRitualsWhitelisted
fields.description: Whether the user's channel is whitelisted into the rituals experiment.
fields.deprecationReason: Rituals is whitelisted only for launch.

fields.name: isSharingActivity
fields.description:
The user's activity sharing setting.
Activity is the part of a user's status that shows what they're currently playing, watching, or streaming.
Requires the `user_presence_friends_read` scope.

fields.name: preferredLanguageTag
fields.description: The user's preferred language tag for displaying text content.

fields.name: visibility
fields.description:
The user's shared availability while online.
A value of ONLINE (typically called "invisibility") additionally means that the user's activity will not be shared
regardless of the isSharingActivity setting.
Requires the `user_presence_friends_read` scope.

types.name: Tournament
types.description:
Tournament is an object that contains all information about a tournament
managed within Bits for a specific event tied to cheering.
NOTE: Should have been named CheeringTournament.

fields.name: globalLeaderboard
fields.description: Leaderboard of all users who have cheered in the tournament.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Event ID of the tournament.

fields.name: progress
fields.description:
The list of global milestones that can be claimed in the tournament.
For a given threshold, this milestone is reached when cheers from all users on the channel
is greater than or equal to the threshold. This unlocks a reward for all users who have cheered.

fields.name: rewards
fields.description:
The list of rewards that are a part of the tournament. This is separated out into global, participant, and individual
rewards that can be claimed if the user is logged in.

fields.name: self
fields.description:
The list of individual milestones that can be claimed in the tournament.
for a given threshold, this milestone is reached when an individual user's total cheers in
the channel is greater than or equal to the threshold. This unlocks a reward
for the individual user who cheered.

fields.name: teamLeaderboard
fields.description:
Leaderboard of all teams who have been cheered for in the tournament. This leaderboard contains how much each team
in the tournament was cheered for.

fields.name: teams
fields.description: The list of teams participating in the tournament.

types.name: TournamentProgress
types.description: Describes the amount of progress that has been made in a tournament, with corresponding milestones about said progress.

fields.name: amount
fields.description: The amount of progress that has been made in the tournament. This is not exclusive to cheering in the channel.

fields.name: milestones
fields.description: The milestones associated with the progress made. This is a list of rewards the progress value will unlock.

types.name: TournamentRewards
types.description:
This type holds all information about rewards that are associated with a tournament. The struct parses out
which rewards are Global, Team, and Individual, as well as if you're logged in that status if you can claim the reward.

fields.name: cheerbomb
fields.description: The list of Cheerbomb rewards. If the user is logged in, this will also show the claim status of the reward.

fields.name: global
fields.description: The list of Global rewards. If the user is logged in, this will also show the claim status of the reward.

fields.name: individual
fields.description: The list of Individual rewards. If the user is logged in, this will also show the claim status of the reward.

fields.name: insider
fields.description: The list of Insider rewards, which are granted when one subscribes to the insider pass.

fields.name: team
fields.description: The list of Team rewards. If the user is logged in, this will also show the claim status of the reward.

types.name: TournamentInsiderRewards
types.description: Contains all rewards information about the Insider rewards.

fields.name: badges
fields.description: Twitch chat badge rewards.

fields.name: bits
fields.description: Bits rewards.

fields.name: heroSkins
fields.description: Hero skin rewards.

fields.name: inGameContent
fields.description: In Game Content rewards, like sprays and avatars (non-hero skin rewards).

types.name: TournamentSelfEdge
types.description: Tournament progress related to a user.

fields.name: globalLeaderboardItem
fields.description: The leaderboard entry of the user. Gives the current position and score.

fields.name: progress
fields.description:
Amount of progress a user had made towards the tournament personally. This could be a combination of factors,
including bits cheered in the channel.

fields.name: teams
fields.description:
A list of the amount of bits a user has cheered for a certain team, as well as the
list of milestones that the user could claim with their claim status.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The ID of the team.

fields.name: logoURL
fields.description: The image URL of the team.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Name of the team.

types.name: VerificationRequest
types.description: Represents a user's request to verify a given contact method, such as email address or phone number.

fields.name: address
fields.description: Address that the user is verifying. This will most likely be an email address or phone number.

fields.name: key
fields.description: Key for the entity associated with the address. This is generally the Twitch ID of the user.

fields.name: modified
fields.description: Time at which the verification request was last modified.

fields.name: status
fields.description: Status of the verification request: pending, verified, or rejected.

types.name: VerificationStatus
types.description: Status of a given verification request.

enumValues.name: PENDING
enumValues.description: Pending indicates not yet successfully verified.

enumValues.name: VERIFIED
enumValues.description: Verified indicates successfully verified.

enumValues.name: REJECTED
enumValues.description: Rejected indicates we were unable to send a verification request to the given address, for example if we received a hard bounce from SES.

fields.name: acceptFriendRequest
fields.description: acceptFriendRequest accepts a friend request from the target user to the authenticated user, creating a new Friend relationship.

fields.name: acceptProgramAgreement
fields.description: Accept program agreement during payout onboarding.

fields.name: acceptSquadStreamInvitation
fields.description:
acceptSquadStreamInvitation allows a user that has recieved a squad stream invitation to accept and join
the squad stream.

fields.name: activateExtension
fields.description: Activate an extension which has been installed on a channel.

fields.name: addBrowserPushSubscription
fields.description:
addBrowserPushSubscription adds a browser push subscription for receiving browser (desktop) push notifications.
The client must retrieve the input fields from the browser's push notification API. Client's will
call this when the user opts-in. A browser push subscription is tied to a user's browser (device).
Twitch will use these push subscriptions to send browser push notifications.

Spec: https://www.w3.org/TR/push-api/#push-subscription.

fields.name: addChannelBlockedTerm
fields.description: Adds a blocked term to a channel.

fields.name: addChannelPermittedTerm
fields.description: Adds a permitted term to a channel.

fields.name: addCollectionItem
fields.description: addCollectionItem adds an item to a collection.

fields.name: addDeviceToken
fields.description: addDeviceToken associates a new push notification token to the given user.

fields.name: addEditor
fields.description: Grant a user the editor status for a given channel.

fields.name: addReaction
fields.description: addReaction allows a user to create a reaction for any reactable item in a feed.

fields.name: addRecommendationFeedback
fields.description: addRecommendationFeedback allows a user to add feedback about a recommendation they've received.

fields.name: allowRejectedChatMessage
fields.description: Allows a message rejected on a channel chat.

fields.name: allowRejectedCheer
fields.description: Allows a cheer rejected on a channel chat.

fields.name: applyExtensionActivations
fields.description:
Apply activation state to a subset of installed extensions. In order to deactivate an installed extension,
simply pass a null value in the anchor.

fields.name: archiveChannelRestriction
fields.description: Archives a channel restriction to remove the restriction from the channel.

fields.name: banUserFromChatRoom
fields.description: Bans a user from chat room permanently or for an specified period of time.

fields.name: banUserFromCommunity
fields.description:
banUserFromCommunity allows a user to ban another user from a community
must be the community owner or a moderator.

fields.name: banVideoCommenter
fields.description: banVideoCommenter bans a user from commenting on a video.

fields.name: blockUser
fields.description: Blocks target user from communicating with the current user.

fields.name: cancelBounty
fields.description:
cancelBounty allows a user to cancel a claimed bounty.
If the user has not met the requirements to cancel the bounty, an error will be returned.

fields.name: cancelFriendRequest
fields.description: cancelFriendRequest destroys a friend request relationship from the authenticated user to the target user.

fields.name: cancelPayoutOnboardingWorkflow
fields.description: Cancel a current payout onboarding workflow.

fields.name: claimAllRewards
fields.description:
claimAllRewards allows the current user to claim all rewards for a given campaign domain (e.g. Overwatch League).
If the domain does not exist an error will be returned.

fields.name: claimBounty
fields.description:
claimBounty allows a user to claim a bounty from a campaign (e.g. Stream a Game Campaign).
If the user has not met the requirements to claim it, an error will be returned.

fields.name: claimGiftedOffer
fields.description: claimGiftedOffer allows a user to claim an offer that was gifted to them.

fields.name: claimMilestone
fields.description:
claimMilestone allows the current user to claim a milestone for a campaign (e.g. Overwatch League).
If the user has not met the requirements to claim it, or the milestone does not exist an error will be returned.

fields.name: claimPrimeOffer
fields.description: claimPrimeOffer allows a user to create their entitlement to the given offer/content.

fields.name: clearUnreadFriendRequests
fields.description: clearUnreadFriendRequests marks all friend requests for the authenticated user as read.

fields.name: createBountyCampaign
fields.description: createBountyCampaign creates a campaign for Bounty Board.

fields.name: createChanlet
fields.description: createChanlet creates a new chanlet for a Channel.

fields.name: createClip

fields.name: createCollection
fields.description: createCollection creates a collection with a provided collection name.

fields.name: createCommunity
fields.description: createCommunity allows a user to create a community.

fields.name: createCommunityImageUploadURL
fields.description: createCommunityImageUploadURL creates and returns a url to use on the client side to upload media images.

fields.name: createContentTags
fields.description: createContentTags creates the tags specified and associates it with the piece of content specified.

fields.name: createDropImageUploadURL
fields.description: createDropImageUploadURL creates and returns a url to use on the client side to upload drops images.

fields.name: createFriendRequest
fields.description: createFriendRequest creates a friend request relationship between the authenticated user and the target user.

fields.name: createModeratorComment
fields.description:
createModeratorComment creates and returns a comment on the target user in the given channel.
Requester must be a moderator or higher in the channel.

fields.name: createMultiviewContentAttributeImageUploadConfig
fields.description: createMultiviewContentAttributeImageUploadConfig creates and returns a upload configuration for uploading and retrieving content attribute images.

fields.name: createMultiviewContentAttributes
fields.description: createMultiviewContentAttributes creates new content attributes with server assigned IDs.

fields.name: createPanel
fields.description: createPanel removes a panel.

fields.name: createPartnershipApplication
fields.description: createPartnershipApplication allows a user to create partnership application.

fields.name: createPost
fields.description: createPost creates a new post.

fields.name: createRoom
fields.description: Creates a new chatroom.

fields.name: createSegmentEvent
fields.description: createSegmentEvent allows a user to create a Segment type event.

fields.name: createSingleEvent
fields.description:
createSingleEvent allows a user to create a Single type event.  The Single type describes generic,
basic, self-contained events that only occur once.

fields.name: createSquadStreamInvitation
fields.description: Creates an invitation to a new or existing squad stream.

fields.name: createTimetableEvent
fields.description: createTimetableEvent allows a user to create a Timetable type event.

fields.name: createVideoBookmark
fields.description: createVideoBookmark creates a video bookmark.

fields.name: createVideoComment
fields.description: createVideoComment creates a video comment.

fields.name: createVideoHighlight
fields.description: createVideoHighlight creates a video of type Highlight from an Archive type video.

fields.name: deactivateExtension
fields.description: Deactivate an extension which has been installed on a channel.

fields.name: deleteChannelBlockedTerm
fields.description: Deletes a blocked term from a channel.

fields.name: deleteChannelPermittedTerm
fields.description: Deletes a permitted term from a channel.

fields.name: deleteChatMessage
fields.description: deleteChatMessage deletes a single message from stream chat.

fields.name: deleteClips
fields.description:
deleteClips allows a user to delete clips by slugs, video id, or broadcast id.
Only the slug and id can be accessed from the list of deleted clips.

fields.name: deleteCollection
fields.description: deleteCollection performs a delete on the collection with the provided ID.

fields.name: deleteContentTags
fields.description: deleteContentTags removes the tags specified and associates it with the piece of content specified.

fields.name: deleteDefaultPaymentMethod
fields.description:
Deletes the default payment method for a user.
Currently supports the Zuora (credit card) and Recurly (credit card, Pay-with-Amazon, PayPal) payment providers.

fields.name: deleteDeviceToken
fields.description: deleteDeviceToken deletes a previously added device token by user and device token ID.

fields.name: deleteEventCollection
fields.description: deleteEventCollection allows an authorized user to delete an event collection.

fields.name: deleteEventLeaf
fields.description: deleteEventLeaf allows an authorized user to delete an event leaf.

fields.name: deleteModeratorComment
fields.description:
deleteModeratorComment deletes a moderator comment with the given ID.
The comment must have been created on the requester's channel.

fields.name: deleteMultiviewContentAttributes
fields.description: deleteMultiviewContentAttributes deletes content attributes with the provided IDs.

fields.name: deleteNotification
fields.description: deleteNotification deletes an onsite notification of the authenticated user.

fields.name: deletePanel
fields.description: deletePanel removes a panel.

fields.name: deletePost
fields.description: deletePost deletes a old post.

fields.name: deleteRecommendationFeedback
fields.description: deleteRecommendationFeedback deletes all the recommendation feedback that matches the given input.

fields.name: deleteRoom
fields.description: Deletes a chatroom.

fields.name: deleteRoomMessage
fields.description: Deletes an existing message in a chatroom.

fields.name: deleteSquadStreamInvitation
fields.description: deleteSquadStreamInvitation allows a squad stream member to delete a squad stream invitation.

fields.name: deleteVideoComment
fields.description:
deleteVideoComment performs a delete on the video comment with the provided comment ID.
NOTE: this should use an input argument, not define the commentID right here.

fields.name: denyRejectedChatMessage
fields.description: Denies a message rejected on a channel chat.

fields.name: denyRejectedCheer
fields.description: Denies a cheer rejected on a channel chat.

fields.name: disableUserAccount
fields.description: Allows the current user to disable or permanently delete their own account.

fields.name: dismissFriendRecommendation
fields.description:
dismissFriendRecommendation removes a friend recommendation to the authenticated user without creating a friend
request.

fields.name: dismissPurchaseToken
fields.description: dismissPurchaseToken allows the current user to dismiss a purchase token notification without sharing in chat.

fields.name: dismissRitualToken
fields.description: Permanently dismiss a ritual token without redeeming it.

fields.name: editCommunity
fields.description:
editCommunity allows a user to edit a community's settings
must be the community owner.

fields.name: editRoomMessage
fields.description: Edits an existing message in a chatroom.

fields.name: emitCampaignDiscoveryEvent
fields.description: emitCampaignDiscoveryEvent updates a user's progress towards a discovery objective in applicable campaigns.

fields.name: followCommunity
fields.description: followCommunity allows a user to follow a community.

fields.name: followDeprecatedEvent
fields.description: followDeprecatedEvent allows the currently authenticated user to follow an event.

fields.name: followEvent
fields.description: followEvent allows the currently authenticated user to follow an event.

fields.name: followGame
fields.description: followGame allows a user to follow a game.

fields.name: followUser
fields.description:
followUser creates a follow relationship between the authenticated user and
the target user.

fields.name: generateSubscribersCSV
fields.description:
generateSubscribersCSV kicks off a background job that will generate a csv containing a list
of the channel's subscribers and then will alert the frontend that the csv is ready to
download using pubsub. Authenticated on the channelID.

fields.name: giftOffer
fields.description: Gifts an offer to designated user.

fields.name: grantVIP
fields.description: Grant the VIP status to a user for a channel.

fields.name: hostTargetChannel
fields.description: Host a target channel from a channel.

fields.name: installExtension
fields.description: Install an extension onto a specific channel.

fields.name: invalidateEmailAssociation
fields.description: Invalidates an association to an email.

fields.name: joinChannelRooms
fields.description: Joins the channel's chatrooms.

fields.name: leaveChannelRooms
fields.description: Leaves the channel's chatrooms.

fields.name: leaveSquadStream
fields.description:
leaveSquadStream allows a member of a squad stream to leave the squad.  Their stream will be
removed from the viewer experience, and they will be free to start/join another squad stream.

fields.name: linkSSO
fields.description: Link a single sign-on (SSO) app to a user's account.

fields.name: makeKeyBatchDownloadURL
fields.description: Makes a download URL for an authorized user to download a batch of keys.

fields.name: modUser
fields.description: Make a user a moderator for a channel.

fields.name: orderPanels
fields.description:
orderPanels updates the sort order of the provided panels, the input must be a list of panel ids
all of which are owned by the acting user otherwise the request will fail and a generic GraphQL
error will be returned.

fields.name: publishClip
fields.description: publishClip allows a user to permanently edit and update their default clip, viewable to the public.

fields.name: readNotifications
fields.description: readNotifications sets the read state to true for one or more onsite notifications of the authenticated user.

fields.name: redeemClaimable
fields.description: Redeem a claimable code, like a bits key code to add bits to your account, etc.

fields.name: redeemRitualToken
fields.description:
Redeem an available ritual token. Currently, tokens are redeemed by sending
a special message to a channel's chat.

fields.name: redeemTrueXAd
fields.description:
redeemTrueXAd processes the result of watching an ad to earn bits.
This action can only be taken if an OAuth token is supplied with the request.

fields.name: regenerateVerificationCode
fields.description: regenerateVerificationCode generates a new verification code and resends the verification message with the new code.

fields.name: registerPayoutInformation
fields.description: Register payout information during payout onboarding.

fields.name: rejectFriendRequest
fields.description: rejectFriendRequest destroys a friend request relationship from the target user to the authenticated user.

fields.name: rejectSquadStreamInvitation
fields.description: rejectSquadStreamInvitation allows a user to decline an invitation to join a squad stream.

fields.name: removeCollectionItem
fields.description: removeCollectionItem removes an item from a collection.

fields.name: removeEditor
fields.description: Revoke the editor status from a user for a given channel.

fields.name: removeReaction
fields.description: removeReaction removes a reaction created with addReaction.

fields.name: removeSquadStreamMember
fields.description: removeSquadStreamMember allows the owner of a squad stream to remove a member from the squad stream.

fields.name: reorderCollectionItem
fields.description: reorderCollectionItem reorders an item's position in a collection.

fields.name: reportContent
fields.description: reportContent allows a user to report content on the site as infringing of our terms of service.

fields.name: reportUserInCommunity
fields.description: reportUserInCommunity allows a user to report another user for violating a community's rules.

fields.name: reportWhisperThread
fields.description: Reports a whisper thread as spam.

fields.name: requestRitualToken
fields.description: Request a ritual token to be issued to the user.

fields.name: resendVerificationEmail
fields.description: resendVerificationEmail resends a verification email to the current user.

fields.name: restrictVideo
fields.description: restrictVideo creates a restriction to an Archive type video.

fields.name: revokeVIP
fields.description: Revoke the VIP status of a user from a channel.

fields.name: sendCheer
fields.description:
sendCheer sends a chat message that contains cheermotes. The message will
be processed, bits deducted from the authenticated user's balance, and then the
message will be passed on to the chat service (client shouldn't send the message itself).
This action can only be taken if an OAuth token is supplied with the request.

fields.name: sendRoomMessage
fields.description: Sends a message to a chatroom.

fields.name: sendWhisper
fields.description: Sends a whisper message to the target user.

fields.name: setAmendmentAcceptance
fields.description: setAmendmentAcceptance sets that the acting user has agreed to the given amendment type.

fields.name: setBitsUserSettings
fields.description: setBitsUserSettings sets a Bits users settings such as skipping the tutorial.

fields.name: setChannelFeedEnabled
fields.description: Set value for channel_feed_enabled.

fields.name: setChannelNotificationSetting
fields.description: setChannelNotificationSetting allows a user to set a notification setting.

fields.name: setDefaultPaymentMethod
fields.description:
Sets the default payment method for a user.
Currently supports the Zuora (credit card) and Recurly (credit card, Pay-with-Amazon, PayPal) payment providers
This is the final step of the payment method management flow. (User.paymentMethods -> User.paymentMethodConfigs -> this mutation).

fields.name: setExtensionFeatureFlags
fields.description: Sets the feature flag options on a specified extension installation.

fields.name: setModLogsAccess
fields.description: Set access permission to the channel's moderator logs for a given role.

fields.name: setNotificationSetting
fields.description: setNotificationSetting allows a user to set a notification setting.

fields.name: setOverwatchLeagueTeamPreference
fields.description: setOverwatchLeagueTeamPreference allows a user to set their preferred Overwatch team.

fields.name: setPreferredLanguageTag
fields.description: Set a user's preferred language tag.

fields.name: setReadableChatColorsEnabled
fields.description: Set a user's readable chat colors UI setting.

fields.name: setSessionStatus
fields.description:
setSessionStatus sets the user's status for this session, which influences how they appear ("online", "idle",
"watching SnarfyBobo") to friends and related users. To maintain a session status, setSessionStatus needs to be sent
periodically. The amount of time your application should wait between these status heartbeats is included in the
response payload.

fields.name: setUserResidence
fields.description: Set user's country of residence.

fields.name: sharePurchaseTokenInChat
fields.description: sharePurchaseTokenInChat allows the current user to share a purchase token in the chat with a message.

fields.name: spendSubscriptionCredit
fields.description: Spend Twitch Prime monthly subscription credit.

fields.name: startBounty
fields.description:
startBounty allows a user to start a bounty for tracking (e.g. track the viewers CCU for meeting the bounty's requirements).
If the user has not provided a title or met the other requirements to start the bounty, it will return an error.

fields.name: startPayoutOnboardingWorkflow
fields.description: Start a new payout onboarding workflow.

fields.name: stopBounty
fields.description: stopBounty allows a user to stop tracking progress for a bounty.

fields.name: submitEmoticonPrefix
fields.description:
Submit a new emoticon prefix for a given channel. Each channel has a single prefix. Submitting
more than once simply overrides the previously set prefix and putting it in a pending state.

fields.name: timeoutUserFromCommunity
fields.description:
timeoutUserFromCommunity allows a user to time out another user from a community
must be the community owner or a moderator.

fields.name: toggleRitualsEnabled
fields.description: toggleRitualsEnabled allows a user to toggle the rituals feature for their channel.

fields.name: tosBanCommunity
fields.description: tosBanCommunity allows a Twitch admin to tos-ban a community from the site.

fields.name: unbanUserFromChatRoom
fields.description: Removes a ban imposed on a user for an especified chat room.

fields.name: unbanUserFromCommunity
fields.description:
unbanUserFromCommunity allows a user to unban another user from a community
must be the community owner or a moderator.

fields.name: unblockUser
fields.description: Removes block from target user.

fields.name: undoRecommendationFeedback
fields.description: undoRecommendationFeedback allows a user to removes a single piece of feedback.

fields.name: unfollowCommunity
fields.description: unfollowCommunity allows a user to unfollow a community.

fields.name: unfollowDeprecatedEvent
fields.description: unfollowDeprecatedEvent allows the currently authenticated user to unfollow an event.

fields.name: unfollowEvent
fields.description: unfollowEvent allows the currently authenticated user to unfollow an event.

fields.name: unfollowGame
fields.description: unfollowGame allows a user to unfollow a game.

fields.name: unfollowUser
fields.description:
unfollowUser destroys the follow relationship between the authenticated user and
the target user.

fields.name: unfriendUser
fields.description: unfriendUser destroys a friend relationship from the target user to the authenticated user.

fields.name: unhost
fields.description: Unhost from a channel.

fields.name: uninstallExtension
fields.description: Uninstall an extension from a specific channel.

fields.name: unlinkAmazonConnection
fields.description: Unlink an authenticated user's amazon connection.

fields.name: unlinkSSO
fields.description: Unlink an SSO app from a user's account.

fields.name: unmodUser
fields.description: Remove moderator status from a user in a channel.

fields.name: unsubscribeEmail
fields.description: unsubscribeEmail unsubscribes a given user from a given email campaign.

fields.name: untimeoutUserFromCommunity
fields.description:
untimeoutUserFromCommunity allows a user to un-time out another user from a community
must be the community owner or a moderator.

fields.name: updateAllWhisperThreads
fields.description: Updates all of a user's whisper threads.

fields.name: updateAutoModProperties
fields.description: Set individual automod categories (i.e. set identity to level 3 but profanity to 0).

fields.name: updateBitsBadgeTierNotification
fields.description: Updates bits badge tier notification.

fields.name: updateBroadcastSettings
fields.description: updateBroadcastSettings allows the user to update their broadcast setting.

fields.name: updateChanletContentAttributes
fields.description: updateChanletContentAttributes allows users to make changes to the multi-view content attributes on a chanlet.

fields.name: updateChatColor
fields.description: Updates a user's chat color.

fields.name: updateChatSettings
fields.description: Set different chat settings (i.e. disable globalBannedWordsOptOut).

fields.name: updateCheerPartnerSettings
fields.description: Update the user's partner settings regarding bits.

fields.name: updateClip
fields.description: updateClip allows a user to update the metadata of a clip.

fields.name: updateClipViewCount
fields.description: updateClipViewCount allows a user to increment the viewcount of a clip.
fields.deprecationReason: Will eventually be replaced by different viewcounting method

fields.name: updateCollection
fields.description: updateCollection performs an update on the collection with the provided ID and updated attributes.

fields.name: updateContentTags
fields.description: updateContentTags updates the tags specified and associates it with the piece of content specified.

fields.name: updateEventBroadcastNotifications
fields.description:
updateEventBroadcastNotifications allows a user to update their notification settings for a given
EventBroadcast.

fields.name: updateIsSharingActivity
fields.description: Changes the user's activity sharing setting. A user's activity is one part of their status.

fields.name: updateLiveUpNotification
fields.description: Changes the user's activity sharing setting. A user's activity is one part of their status.

fields.name: updateMultiviewContentAttributes
fields.description: Modifies multi-view content attributes.

fields.name: updateOnboardingSkippedChannels
fields.description: updateOnboardingSkippedChannels updates skipped channel IDs during onboarding for a given user.

fields.name: updatePanel
fields.description: updatePanel updates the data for a given panel.

fields.name: updatePremiereEvent
fields.description: updatePremiereEvent allows a user to update a Premiere type event.

fields.name: updatePrimeOfferStatus
fields.description: updatePrimeOfferStatus allows a user to update their status in respect to an offer. (e.g. UNSEEN, SEEN, CLAIMED).

fields.name: updatePrimeSettings
fields.description:
updatePrimeSettings allows the user to enable or disable chat notifications when spending a Prime Credit,
and allows the user to set the type of Smilies (Turbos, Robots, or Monkeys) they want for Prime/Turbo Emoticons.

fields.name: updateRoom
fields.description: Updates an existing chatroom.

fields.name: updateRoomModes
fields.description: Updates the room modes (slow mode, emotes only mode, etc.) for the room.

fields.name: updateRoomView
fields.description: Update's a user's room view for a chatroom.

fields.name: updateSegmentEvent
fields.description: updateSegmentEvent allows a user to update a Segment type event.

fields.name: updateSingleEvent
fields.description: updateSingleEvent allows a user to update a Single type event.

fields.name: updateSquadStream
fields.description: updateSquadStream allows an owner of a squad stream to update the squad stream.

fields.name: updateSquadStreamSettings
fields.description: updateSquadStreamSettings allows a broadcaster to update their squad stream settings.

fields.name: updateSubscriptionProduct
fields.description: updateSubscriptionProduct allows a user to update their subscription product settings.

fields.name: updateTimetableEvent
fields.description: updateTimetableEvent allows a user to update a Timetable type event.

fields.name: updateUserDirectoryHidden
fields.description: Set a user's directory hidden field.

fields.name: updateUserEmailReusable
fields.description: Set a user's email reuse field.

fields.name: updateUserSubscriptionSettings
fields.description: updateUserSubscriptionSettings updates the subscription preferences for the authenticated user.

fields.name: updateVideoComment
fields.description: updateVideoComment updates a video comment identified by provided comment ID.

fields.name: updateVideoRestriction
fields.description: updateVideoRestriction creates a restriction to an Archive type video.

fields.name: updateVisibility
fields.description:
Changes the user's visibility setting. This is an account-level setting that will cause the user's availability to
appear differently to other users, despite what sessions are reporting. See the VisibilityInput enum for details on
the effects of each value.

Because this is an account-level setting, it should only be used in response to the user expressing clear intention
to change their visibility. Setting a status for an individual session should be done using setSessionStatus.

fields.name: updateWhisperThread
fields.description: Updates a whisper thread.

fields.name: useChatNotificationToken
fields.description: Uses a chat notification token.

fields.name: validateVerificationCode
fields.description: validateVerificationCode validates a given code and sets the address to verified if it matches.

fields.name: verifyContactMethod
fields.description: verifyContactMethod verifies a user contact method from an opaque ID.

fields.name: viewedNotifications
fields.description: viewedNotifications updates when the authenticated user last saw onsite notifications.

inputFields.name: targetID
inputFields.description: The authenticated user will accept the friend request sent by the user with an ID equal to targetID.

fields.name: user
fields.description: The user whose friend request was just accepted.

types.name: AcceptProgramAgreementInput
types.description: AcceptProgramAgreementInput is the input required when accepting a program agreement.

inputFields.name: targetUserID
inputFields.description: TargetUserID is the ID of the user whose program agreement will be accepted.

inputFields.name: type
inputFields.description: Agreement type being accepted for payout onboarding.

inputFields.name: version
inputFields.description: Version of agreement (e.g. "v1").

types.name: AcceptProgramAgreementPayload
types.description: AcceptProgramAgreementPayload is the payload returned after accepting a program agreement.

fields.name: error
fields.description: Describes error that occured while accepting a program agreement.

fields.name: workflow
fields.description: New workflow state.

types.name: AcceptProgramAgreementError
types.description: Enumerates possible errors when accepting a program agreement.

enumValues.name: UNAUTHENTICATED
enumValues.description: Must have auth credentials to agree to a program agreement.

enumValues.name: FORBIDDEN
enumValues.description: User does not have permission to agree to the program agreement for the targeted user.

enumValues.name: INVALID_AGREEMENT_VERSION
enumValues.description: Version of the agreement provided in the input is not valid.

enumValues.name: INTERNAL_ERROR
enumValues.description: An internal error has occurred.

types.name: AcceptSquadStreamInvitationInput
types.description: Inputs to the acceptSquadStreamInvitation mutation.

inputFields.name: invitationID
inputFields.description: ID of the invitation to be accepted.

types.name: AcceptSquadStreamInvitationPayload
types.description: Outputs from the acceptSquadStreamInvitation mutation.

fields.name: error
fields.description: Error from mutation if exists.

fields.name: invitation
fields.description: The accepted invitation.

types.name: AcceptSquadStreamInvitationError
types.description: Errors from acceptSquadStreamInvitation mutation.

fields.name: code
fields.description: Error from request to accept invitation.

types.name: AcceptSquadStreamInvitationErrorCode
types.description: Possible errors from this mutation.

enumValues.name: INVITATION_NOT_FOUND
enumValues.description: Invitation to be accepted does not exist.

enumValues.name: SQUAD_NOT_FOUND
enumValues.description: Squad associated with the invitation does not exist.

enumValues.name: UNAUTHORIZED
enumValues.description: User does not have permissions to accept invitation.

enumValues.name: INVITATION_CANNOT_BE_ACCEPTED
enumValues.description: Invitation not in pending state cannot be accepted.

types.name: ActivateExtensionInput
types.description: The input to be provided to the activateExtension mutation.

inputFields.name: anchor
inputFields.description: The anchor the extension is getting activated into.

inputFields.name: extensionInstallationID
inputFields.description: The composite ID of an extension installation <extensionID:version:channelID>.

inputFields.name: slot
inputFields.description: The slot the extension is getting activated into.

types.name: ActivateExtensionPayload
types.description: The result of an activateExtension mutation.

fields.name: installedExtensions
fields.description: The resulting list of installed extensions after the activation.

inputFields.name: auth
inputFields.description: An authentication secret. It must be a non-blank string.

inputFields.name: endpoint
inputFields.description:
A custom URL pointing to a push server, which can be used to send a push message to the
particular service worker instance that subscribed to the push service. It must be a
non-blank string.

inputFields.name: p256DH
inputFields.description: An Elliptic curve DiffieHellman public key on the P-256 curve. It must be a non-blank string.

fields.name: browserPushSubscriptionID
fields.description:
The opaque ID of the push subscription. The entire push subscription is not returned because
there is no product use for it. Also, there is no existing query or mutation that can use this ID,
but it could be used for future functionality.

types.name: AddChannelBlockedTermInput
types.description: AddChannelBlockedTermInput takes in the channel, phrases, and if the term should be editable by mods.

inputFields.name: channelID
inputFields.description: channelID is the channelID owner of terms.

inputFields.name: isModEditable
inputFields.description: isModEditable is if the term is viewable or editable by mods.

inputFields.name: phrases
inputFields.description: phrases is the strings that are blocked.

types.name: AddChannelBlockedTermPayload
types.description: The returned data from the mutation.

fields.name: addedAt
fields.description: The time term was added.

fields.name: error
fields.description: Mutation error caused by the user input.

fields.name: phrases
fields.description: The phrases that were added.

types.name: AddChannelBlockedTermError
types.description: Possible errors that this resolver returns.

enumValues.name: NO_PERMISSIONS
enumValues.description: User does not have permission to add blocked term in channel.

enumValues.name: DURATION_INVALID
enumValues.description: Duration provided was invalid.

types.name: AddChannelPermittedTermInput
types.description: AddChannelPermittedTermInput takes in the channel, phrases, and if the term should be editable by mods.

inputFields.name: channelID
inputFields.description: channelID is the owner of the permitted terms.

inputFields.name: phrases
inputFields.description: phrases are the strings that are permitted in a channel.

types.name: AddChannelPermittedTermPayload
types.description: The returned payload from the mutation.

fields.name: addedAt
fields.description: The time term was added.

fields.name: error
fields.description: Mutation error caused by the user input.

fields.name: phrases
fields.description: The phrases that were added.

types.name: AddChannelPermittedTermError
types.description: Possible errors that this resolver returns.

enumValues.name: NO_PERMISSIONS
enumValues.description: User does not have permission to add Permitted term in channel.

enumValues.name: DURATION_INVALID
enumValues.description: Duration provided was invalid.

types.name: AddCollectionItemInput
types.description: AddCollectionItemInput accepts a collectionID and item ID and parameters to add the item to a collection.

inputFields.name: collectionID
inputFields.description: The id of the collection.

inputFields.name: itemID
inputFields.description: The id of the item of which will be added to the collection.

inputFields.name: itemType
inputFields.description: The type of item ie. video.

types.name: AddCollectionItemPayload
types.description: The response from adding an item to a collection.

fields.name: collection
fields.description: The newly updated collection.

types.name: AddDeviceTokenInput
types.description: AddDeviceTokenInput accepts a token and other parameters to add a device token to a given user.

inputFields.name: appBuild
inputFields.description: App build number of the current device.

inputFields.name: deviceID
inputFields.description: Unique identifier of the current device.

inputFields.name: deviceName
inputFields.description: Arbitrary name associated with the device.

inputFields.name: deviceToken
inputFields.description: The ID of the new token.

inputFields.name: notificationCapabilitiesTypes
inputFields.description: Notification capabilities of the current device.

inputFields.name: onsiteCapabilitiesTypes
inputFields.description: Onsite notification capabilities of the current device.

inputFields.name: platform
inputFields.description: The platform the token is associated with, i.e. 'android' or 'ios'.

inputFields.name: userID
inputFields.description: ID for the user associated with the new device token.

types.name: AddDeviceTokenPayload
types.description: The response from adding a push notification token to a user.

fields.name: deviceToken
fields.description: The ID of the new token.

types.name: AddEditorInput
types.description: AddEditorInput contains the parameters to add an editor.

inputFields.name: channelID
inputFields.description: The channel for which the target user will become an editor.

inputFields.name: targetUserID
inputFields.description:
The ID of the user who will become an editor.
Either targetUserID or targetUserLogin must be provided.

inputFields.name: targetUserLogin
inputFields.description:
The login of the user who will become an editor.
Either targetUserID or targetUserLogin must be provided.

types.name: AddEditorPayload
types.description: AddEditorPayload is the response after attemping to add an editor.

fields.name: channel
fields.description: The channel for which the target user will become an editor.

fields.name: error
fields.description:
The client error that has occurred.
Null if the operation is successful.

fields.name: targetUser
fields.description: The user who became an editor.

types.name: AddEditorError
types.description: AddEditorError contains details about a client error that occurred.

fields.name: code
fields.description: The type of error that occurred when adding an editor.

types.name: AddEditorErrorCode
types.description: AddEditorErrorCode defines a client error that occurred while adding an editor.

enumValues.name: CHANNEL_NOT_FOUND
enumValues.description: The channel does not exist.

enumValues.name: TARGET_USER_ALREADY_EDITOR
enumValues.description: The user who is to become an editor is already an editor.

enumValues.name: TARGET_USER_NOT_FOUND
enumValues.description: The user who is to become an editor does not exist.

types.name: AddRecommendationFeedbackInput
types.description: Data required to add recommendation feedback.

inputFields.name: category
inputFields.description: Reason for the feedback (ie. Not interested, offensive, etc).

inputFields.name: itemID
inputFields.description: The id of the item (channelID, gameID, etc).

inputFields.name: itemType
inputFields.description: One of CHANNEL, GAME, SHELF, VOD.

inputFields.name: sourceItemPage
inputFields.description: The page this event was fired from.

inputFields.name: sourceItemRequestID
inputFields.description: The unique id given to this request.

inputFields.name: sourceItemTrackingID
inputFields.description: The tracking id of the shelf / shelf card.

types.name: AddRecommendationFeedbackPayload
types.description: Returns the created feedback item back to the client.

fields.name: recommendationFeedback
fields.description: Feedback item.

types.name: AllowRejectedCheerInput
types.description: Input to the allowRejectedCheer mutation.

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description:
Client-generated unique ID used to prevent a cheer from being re-sent (thus spending double bits).
The server will reject any request with an ID that has already been used.

inputFields.name: targetUserID
inputFields.description: ID of the user whose message is automodded.

types.name: AllowRejectedCheerPayload
types.description: Payload from the allowRejectedCheer mutation.

fields.name: id
fields.description:
Client-generated unique ID used to prevent a cheer from being re-sent (thus spending double bits).
The server will reject any request with an ID that has already been used.

types.name: ApplyExtensionActivationsInput
types.description: A mapping of extension type to list of activation configs.

inputFields.name: activations
inputFields.description: A list of activations to apply to the given channelID.

inputFields.name: channelID
inputFields.description: The ID of the channel the activations are being performed on.

types.name: ExtensionActivationInput
types.description:
Represents the action which should be taken on the provided installation ID. If no
anchor configuration is provided, the installation will be deactivated.

inputFields.name: component
inputFields.description: The required activation input to apply activation state to a component anchor.

inputFields.name: installationID
inputFields.description: The installation ID of the component extension you're attempting to activate.

inputFields.name: panel
inputFields.description: The required activation input to apply activation state to a panel anchor.

inputFields.name: videoOverlay
inputFields.description: The required activation input to apply activation state to a video overyla anchor.

types.name: ComponentActivationInput
types.description: The required configuration to activate a component extension.

inputFields.name: slot
inputFields.description: The slot name of where the component extension should be displayed.

inputFields.name: x
inputFields.description:
The horizontal positioning of the left side of the component extension from the left side
of the visible video space as a fixed-point percentage (ie: 5742 would represent 57.42 percent).

inputFields.name: y
inputFields.description:
The vertical positioning of the top side of the component extension from the top side
of the visible video space as a fixed-point percentage (ie: 5742 would represent 57.42 percent).

types.name: PanelActivationInput
types.description: The required configuration to activate a panel extension.

inputFields.name: expiresIn
inputFields.description:
This argument accepts a string specifying a duration.
It takes a succession of a number (positive integer) and a time unit, one of:
s[econd[s]], m[inute[s]], h[our[s]], d[ay[s]], w[eek[s]], mo[nth[s]].
Number/unit pairs can be contiguous or separated by spaces.
Valid examples: "3d4h" "11 minutes" "2month", "1s", "12 second"
If not provided, target is banned permanently.

inputFields.name: bits
inputFields.description: bits is the number of bits the message will spend (as parsed by the client).

inputFields.name: content
inputFields.description: content is the text to process and forward to the chat system.

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description:
Client-generated unique ID used to prevent a cheer from being re-sent (thus spending double bits).
The server will reject any request with an ID that has already been used.

inputFields.name: isAutoModEnabled
inputFields.description: Optional field that dictates whether automod should be enabled for the cheer or not.

inputFields.name: roomID
inputFields.description:
Optional field that dictates the cheer message was sent from a room, as this provides the context for what room
it was sent from.

inputFields.name: shouldCheerAnyway
inputFields.description: Optional field that dictates that the user want to cheer anyways, even though they know it will be automodded.

inputFields.name: targetID
inputFields.description: targetID is the `User.id` of the channel to send the cheer to.

fields.name: currentUser
fields.description: currentUser is the authenticated user object which includes the updated `Wallet` info after the message bits have been spent.

fields.name: id
fields.description: id is the client-generated value passed in as part of the request.

fields.name: validationError
fields.description: If any validation errors occur, this will not be nil.

types.name: SendCheerValidationError
types.description: Resolver for validation errors that occur on send cheer.

fields.name: code
fields.description: Error code that describes the validation error.

fields.name: message
fields.description: Error message that is returned from the backend service.

fields.name: messageContent
fields.description: Optional rejected message for when the error requires frontend message changes, like AutoMod'd messages.

types.name: SendCheerValidationErrorCode
types.description: Validation error status codes.

enumValues.name: AMOUNT_BELOW_MIN_BITS
enumValues.description: Bits amount is below the minimum.

enumValues.name: AUTO_MOD_MESSAGE
enumValues.description: The message was auto modded.

enumValues.name: CHANNEL_INELIGIBLE
enumValues.description: The channel was ineligible for receiving bits.

enumValues.name: EMOTE_AMOUNT_BELOW_MIN_BITS
enumValues.description: The emote amount was below the minimum bits emote amount.

enumValues.name: INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE
enumValues.description: The user has insufficient balance.

enumValues.name: INVALID_BITS_AMOUNT
enumValues.description: The bits amount is invalid.

enumValues.name: INVALID_BITS_MESSAGE
enumValues.description: The bits message is invalid.

enumValues.name: INVALID_EVENT_ID
enumValues.description: The event ID is invalid, probably because it's been used.

enumValues.name: MESSAGE_LENGTH_EXCEEDED
enumValues.description: The message length is greater than the max message length.

enumValues.name: REQUEST_THROTTLED
enumValues.description: The request has been throttled.

enumValues.name: TOO_LARGE_BITS_EMOTE
enumValues.description: The bits emotes that were sent were greater than the max allowed.

enumValues.name: TOO_LARGE_CHEER
enumValues.description: The cheer was over the maximum cheer limit.

enumValues.name: UNKNOWN
enumValues.description: An unknown error has occurred, but it was a validation error.

enumValues.name: USER_BANNED
enumValues.description: The user is banned from bits.

enumValues.name: USER_INELIGIBLE
enumValues.description: The user is ineligible to send bits.

enumValues.name: USER_SUSPENDED
enumValues.description: The use is suspended from sending bits.

enumValues.name: ZALGO_MESSAGE
enumValues.description: The message contained Zalgo text.

enumValues.name: AUTO_MOD_PENDING

types.name: SetSessionStatusInput
types.description:
SetSessionStatusInput represents a user's status within a single session (browser tab, game, desktop application,
mobile application, etc.).

inputFields.name: activity
inputFields.description:
activity is the action the user is performing in your application. The purpose of an activity is to allow the user's
friends and related users to join in on whatever the user is doing. If the user is not performing any action that
other users can join in on (e.g. watching a VOD, browsing their settings page) or is not performing any action at
all, this should be set to null.

inputFields.name: availability
inputFields.description:
availability is the state of the user's session in your application. You should set it to ONLINE if the user is
known to be at their device, IDLE if they are not, and OFFLINE if your application is currently terminating.

Note that if your application fails to send an OFFLINE heartbeat before terminating, the session will automatically
expire after some time without a heartbeat.

inputFields.name: sessionID
inputFields.description:
sessionID must be supplied and can be any string unique to this session. Generating a random UUID when your
application starts and sending it for each setSessionStatus is a good idea.

Each instance of your application should send the same ID for each of its setSessionStatus calls, but two instances
of your application running at the same time should never have the same session ID.

types.name: ActivityInput
types.description:
ActivityInput represents what the user is doing right now.

If type is WATCHING, userID must be supplied.

If type is PLAYING, gameID must be supplied.

fields.name: setAgainInSeconds
fields.description:
The number of seconds your application should wait before sending another setSessionStatus. If your application does
not call setSessionStatus again within roughly this duration, it will be assumed to have terminated unexpectedly and
its session status for this user will expire.

fields.name: user
fields.description: The modified user.

types.name: UpdateVisibilityInput
types.description:
The change that will be applied to the user's visibility. See VisibilityInput for details on the effects of each
value.

types.name: VisibilityInput
types.description: A visibility type for the user.

enumValues.name: ONLINE
enumValues.description:
An ONLINE visibility (default) will cause the user's availability to be inherited from their sessions -- Online if
they have at least one non-idle session, Away if they have only idle sessions, or Offline if they have no sessions.

enumValues.name: AWAY
enumValues.description:
An AWAY visibility will cause the user to appear as Away if they have any sessions, regardless of idleness, or
Offline if they have no sessions.

enumValues.name: BUSY
enumValues.description:
A BUSY visibility will cause the user to appear as Busy if they have any sessions, regardless of idleness, or
Offline if they have no sessions.

enumValues.name: OFFLINE
enumValues.description:
An OFFLINE visibility (also called "invisible") will cause the user to appear as Offline always. It will also
implicitly turn off activity sharing.

fields.name: user
fields.description: The modified user.
